locale.message: Hall of Fame
Adds a page that displays users' achievements
Hall Of Fame
Settings of the Hall of Fame Plugin
Settings
The following people have already supported us.
Path to the hall of fame page
(e.g. about/hallOfFame results in the path 'presspath/about/hallOfFame')
User groups to be included in the hall of fame
(separate with commas, e.g., Typesetter, Proofreader)
Exclude Forthcomings (only for langsci)
Add links to public profiles
Use Unified Style Sheet for Linguistics
Include Commentators (only for langsci)
Restrict the number of people listed in the medal count to:
(Enter 0 if you don't want the medal count to be displayed. If you leave this field empty, all users with achievements will be listed.)
Percentile ranks for gold and silver medal
(separate by comma, e.g. 20, 30)
Date where to start counting
(format: YYYYMMDD)
Number of months for the recency star
(If you leave this field empty, no recency star will be awarded.)
Minimal number of series to be awarded the series star
(If you leave this field empty, no series star will be awarded.)
